concept.title: Known Issues
concept.shortdesc: This topic lists known issues in Eucalyptus 4.2.2 and its dependencies.

conbody.p: Please contact Eucalyptus Support for known workarounds to these issues.

p.b: New known issues for this release:

row.entry: Cannot login to UI when console.ini setting 'session.cookie_expires' set at or below 28800 (GUI-1592)
Please see linked bug for more information.
